titleInfo.title: Dharmakīrtis frühe Logik: annotierte Übersetzung der logischen Teile von Pramāṇavārttika 1 mit der Vṛtti = Dharmakīrti's early logic : an annotated German translation of the logical parts in Pramāṇavārttika 1 and Vṛtti

originInfo.publisher: International Institute for Buddhist Studies of the International College for Postgraduate Buddhist Studies

language.languageTerm: Text in German; introductions in English.
